name: OpioidMedications
title: Opioid Medications
description: (Clinical Focus: This set of SCD and GPCK RxNorm codes aims to capture prescriptions for opioid medications.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify prescriptions for opioid medications.),(Inclusion Criteria: Opioid SCD and GPCK RxNorm codes are included in the value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Buprenorphine as well as medications not considered opioids are excluded from the value set.)
